valueCoding.display: Unable to perform Respiratory Rate at this time

valueExpression.expression: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 2 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.RespiratoryRate').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value > 60 '{Counts}/min' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.RespiratoryRate').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE05').answer.first().empty() and  %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Respiratory Rate Second Count Profile').answer.first().empty()

%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 2 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.RespiratoryRate').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE04').answer.first().empty() and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Respiratory Rate Second Count Profile').answer.first().empty()

valueCoding.display: Respiratory Rate Second Count Not Possible

valueExpression.expression: iif((%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value<2 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.RespiratoryRate').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE04').answer.first().value >= 60 '{Counts}/min'or%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.RespiratoryRate').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value >= 50 '{Counts}/min' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 12or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.RespiratoryRate').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value >= 40 '{Counts}/min' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value>=12 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 60), true, false)

valueCoding.display: Unable to Perform Oral Fluid Test

item.text: Completely Unable to Drink or Vomits Immediately / Everything
Has the Child had anything to drink today?
How did the child last drink

valueCoding.display: Inhaled Bronchodilator Trial Not Feasible or Available

item.text: No Fast Breathing and No Chest Indrawing (post Inhaled Bronchodilator Trial)
Mother able to wait until young infant is willing to breastfeed again

valueExpression.expression: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 6 and (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE28').answer.first().value = true or (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE28').answer.first().value = false and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE29').answer.first().value = false))

item.text: More Areola Visible above than below the Mouth

valueExpression.expression: iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 6 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE31').answer.first().value = true or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE32').answer.first().value = true or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE33').answer.first().value = true or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE34').answer.first().value = true, 'EmCare.B22.DE37', iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 6 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE31').answer.first().value = false and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE32').answer.first().value = false and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE33').answer.first().value = false and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE34').answer.first().value = false, 'EmCare.B22.DE38' , iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE35').answer.first().value = false, 'EmCare.B22.DE39', 'EmCare.B22.DE40') ))

%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 6 and (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE30').answer.first().value = false or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE31').answer.first().value.code.exists() or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE32').answer.first().value.code.exists() or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE33').answer.first().value.code.exists() or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE34').answer.first().value.code.exists() or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.BreastFeeding').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE35').answer.first().value.code.exists() )
